name: Eva Cotton Feel Heavy Flow Wings
description: Newly improved with an additional antibacterial layer to prevent bacterial growth, control odour & maximize absorbency, Eva Cotton Feel Heavy Flow napkins provide you with all day freshness and comfort. Ideal for those with a heavy flow, this napkin is longer in length to provide you with maximum protection and comfort along with wider wings and a super soft feel. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
